title: 94/564/EC: Commission Decision of 27 July 1994 amending Decision 92/469/EEC authorizing methods for grading pig carcases in Denmark (Only the Danish text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 27 July 1994 amending Decision 92/469/EEC authorizing methods for grading pig carcases in Denmark (Only the Danish text is authentic) (94/564/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Denmark.
It shall apply with effect from 1 July 1994.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 July 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 301, 20. 11. 1984, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 320, 22. 12. 1993, p. 5.
(3) OJ No L 265, 11. 9. 1992, p. 39.
